channel.title: I was wrongfully banned. not surprised seeing other people complaining too
channel.description: said i revealed a cult? would love to see the text proof of this...

item.title: I was wrongfully banned. not surprised seeing other people complaining too
item.dc:creator: Methnor
item.description:
The logs of the game that caused you to get suspended, and the reasons behind it, were given to you in the other thread after you decided to start insulting me. You could’ve had a reasonable conversation - if you would’ve shown you were capable of acting like a decent human being, there might’ve been consideration for an appeal. But you’ve shown you can’t do that.

Read full topic
item.source: I was wrongfully banned. not surprised seeing other people complaining too
